Helper functions for component selection

Source: R/select.R
select.helper.Rd

Helper functions for component selection

select.all_thresholds(fit, reduce, p, h, verbose, ...)

select_freq.all_thresholds(fit, p, h, verbose, ...)

select.compute_integral(arr, p)

select.all_draws(rel, threshold)

select.one_draw(rel, threshold)

result_df(val, val_name, comp_names)

Arguments

fit

An object of class lgpfit.
reduce

The reduce argument for relevances.
p

A threshold density over interval [0,1].
h

A discretization parameter for computing a quadrature.
verbose

Should this show a progress bar?
...

Additional arguments to relevances.
arr

an array of frequencies or selections
rel

an array of relevances
threshold

Threshold for relevance sum. Must be a value between 0 and 1.
val

values
val_name

name of variable that val presents
comp_names

component names
